title: Add a TitleIs ranked Provisions broke?
body:
Hey guys just wondering if anyone knows if the ranks system is harsh or broken or what.

I know people complain all the time that they win heaps in provisional games and that they only get bronze 1-5, but generally its because they were ranked bronze/silver before.. this is my first time playing ranked and my Win loss was 7-3. is it normal to get bronze 4 if i have never been ranked or is the system broken?

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Xzist,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=VLnOUrEa,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-26T00:14:24.240+0000)
 this is my first time playing ranked 


That's why, i would not be too concerned starting from the bottom if you have not been there yet!
did you lose the first 2 or 3 games?

okay thanks for that. thought it was a bit extreme :/ 
just gonna have to go throigh the elohell xD

the ranked system is broken with the way streaks work. such as winning 5 in a row means more than winning 10 with 4 losses mixed in. same with loss streaks.
 but going 7-3 in provs should be high silver so idk :/
